subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Aaron Gray, the all-Big East center from Pittsburgh, will skip the N.B.A. draft and return for his senior season. Last season, the 7-foot Gray averaged 13.9 points and a conference-leading 10.5 rebounds for Pittsburgh, which went 25-8. Also, U.C.L.A. guard Jordan Farmar confirmed his decision to remain in the N.B.A. draft.
